message.content: {"responses":[{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.","question_id":"TT4G35A","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students’ abilities.","question_id":"TT4G35B","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.","question_id":"TT4G35C","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).","question_id":"TT4G35D","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.","question_id":"TT4G35E","response":"Strongly agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others’ work as their own.","question_id":"TT4G35F","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.","question_id":"TT4G35G","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students’ misconceptions.","question_id":"TT4G35H","response":"Agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.","question_id":"TT4G35I","response":"Strongly agree"},{"input_statement":"Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.","question_id":"TT4G35J","response":"Agree"}]}
